advancement.bliss.get_backpack.desc: Craft a Backpack so you can carry more items
advancement.bliss.get_paraglider.desc: Find a Paraglider to help you maneuver around
advancement.bliss.get_atlas.desc: Craft an Atlas to store your Maps
advancement.bliss.get_iron_rod.desc: Craft an Iron Rod to break blocks with a Piston
advancement.bliss.get_copper_pipe.desc: Create a Copper Pipe to move items around with a Hopper
advancement.bliss.get_sawmill: I Want to Play a Game
advancement.bliss.get_sawmill.desc: Make a Sawmill to cut wooden blocks down
Put a tiny slime in a bucket to find slime chunks
advancement.bliss.get_trading_post.desc: Create a Trading Post to help trade with lots of villagers
advancement.bliss.get_seed_pouch.desc: Make a Seed Pouch to store your seeds
advancement.bliss.get_diamond_heart.desc: Sneak towards a Stoneling and kill it to get its Heart of Diamond
advancement.bliss.get_pickarang.desc: Fashion a Pickarang out of a Heart of Diamond
advancement.bliss.get_tater.desc: Imprint a Stoneling's Soul into a Tiny Potato
advancement.bliss.get_glow_shroom.desc: Locate a Glimmering Weald and find Glow Shrooms in it
advancement.bliss.get_all_music_discs: I'll Hear the Sound of Happiness
advancement.bliss.get_all_music_discs.de: Acquire all Music and Ambience Discs
advancement.bliss.get_all_crystals.desc: Collect all types of Corundum and Corundum Cluster
